title: No Name in the Artificial Reef?

embed.description: What is the Nautilus-themed Artificial Reef? The Nautilus artificial reef was the final reward in Ocean Week 2015. Players from all around Oceania played games with specific Ocean Week champions (like Fizz, Nami or Nautilus) to contribute one point per win. The points required to construct the artificial reef was a hefty 275,000 from all Oceanic players.

replies.body:
Hey LordDan,

I just checked and you did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year). Which is why your name is not on the reef.

You did however earn 20 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year). That means your name will be on the Ocean Week Community Wall - which is currently in progress and we will have updates in the future.

Well that makes sense.... Thank you Sephyre.  

I do appreciate the explanation.... I will look forward to the wall being submerged....
Hey I'm pretty sure I got enough points in the 2015 ocean week and I was so stoked to get my name on the reef :/ but it isn't there

I accidentally voted wrong :(
Mines not there either, I earn't the points for the 2015 one and got more then enough for the 2016 one.
I remember playing during Ocean Week for the name on statue but changed account names a few times since then so I forgot what my name was during the event.
